org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client

Interface Binding<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Model type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Binder, BindingHandler, Iterable<String>, PropertyBinder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BindingImpl

    public interface Binding<T>
extends PropertyBinder<T>, BindingHandler, Iterable<String>, Binder
    Manager responsible for binding property accessors, validators and formatters to model properties. It updates these values while the user interacts with the view.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean flush()
      Get all values from view, apply to the model and return if all of them were valid.
      boolean flush(String id)
      Get value from view, apply to the model and return if it was not invalid.

      Get the bound model.

      Get validator from specified property.

      Get property's value from model.
      BindingView getView()
      Get the bound view.
      boolean hasProperty(String id)
      Returns true if this binding has a property accessor bound to this property id.

      Informs if the property should be automatically sent to view when updating model.

      Returns an iterator over bound properties' ids.

      Send specified property's value to view.
      void refreshAutoOnly()
      Send all auto refresh properties' values to view.

      Set a model to this databinding and send all bound (auto refresh) properties to view.

      • flush

        boolean flush()
        Get all values from view, apply to the model and return if all of them were valid.
        Returns:
        true if all values were valid, false otherwise

        Get value from view, apply to the model and return if it was not invalid.

        Returns:
        false if it was invalid, true otherwise

      • isAutoRefresh

        boolean isAutoRefresh(String id)
        Informs if the property should be automatically sent to view when updating model.
        Parameters:
        id - identification of the property
        Returns:
        true if property is set to view by updating the model, false otherwise
